mapper.select: select FCUSTOMERID, FDEPARTMENTID, FCUSTOMERNAME, FPASSWORD, FPHONENUM, FIDCARD, FGENDER, FHEADFILE, FISDELETE, FCREATETIME from t_customer where FCUSTOMERID = #{fcustomerid}
mapper.insert: insert into t_customer(FDEPARTMENTID, FCUSTOMERNAME, FPASSWORD, FPHONENUM, FIDCARD, FGENDER, FHEADFILE, FISDELETE, FCREATETIME) values (#{fdepartmentid}, #{fcustomername}, #{fpassword}, #{fphonenum}, #{fidcard}, #{fgender}, #{fheadfile}, #{fisdelete}, #{fcreatetime})

insert into t_customer(FDEPARTMENTID, FCUSTOMERNAME, FPASSWORD, FPHONENUM, FIDCARD, FGENDER, FHEADFILE, FISDELETE, FCREATETIME) values
(#{entity.fdepartmentid}, #{entity.fcustomername}, #{entity.fpassword}, #{entity.fphonenum}, #{entity.fidcard}, #{entity.fgender}, #{entity.fheadfile}, #{entity.fisdelete}, #{entity.fcreatetime})

insert into t_customer(FDEPARTMENTID, FCUSTOMERNAME, FPASSWORD, FPHONENUM, FIDCARD, FGENDER, FHEADFILE, FISDELETE, FCREATETIME) values
(#{entity.fdepartmentid}, #{entity.fcustomername}, #{entity.fpassword}, #{entity.fphonenum}, #{entity.fidcard}, #{entity.fgender}, #{entity.fheadfile}, #{entity.fisdelete}, #{entity.fcreatetime})
on duplicate key update FDEPARTMENTID = values(FDEPARTMENTID), FCUSTOMERNAME = values(FCUSTOMERNAME), FPASSWORD = values(FPASSWORD), FPHONENUM = values(FPHONENUM), FIDCARD = values(FIDCARD), FGENDER = values(FGENDER), FHEADFILE = values(FHEADFILE), FISDELETE = values(FISDELETE), FCREATETIME = values(FCREATETIME)
mapper.update:
update t_customer
FDEPARTMENTID = #{fdepartmentid},
FCUSTOMERNAME = #{fcustomername},
FPASSWORD = #{fpassword},
FPHONENUM = #{fphonenum},
FIDCARD = #{fidcard},
FGENDER = #{fgender},
FHEADFILE = #{fheadfile},
FISDELETE = #{fisdelete},
FCREATETIME = #{fcreatetime},
where FCUSTOMERID = #{fcustomerid}
